text: Qua that, Allah đa nghe loi noi cua nguoi phu nu (ten Khaulah bint Tha'laba) đa khieu nai voi Nguoi (Muhammad) ve viec nguoi chong cua nu (ten Aus bin As-Samit) va than tho voi Allah; va Allah nghe loi đoi thoai giua hai nguoi (Muhammad va nu). Qua that, Allah Hang Nghe va Hang Thay (moi viec)
